firstLook.header: Life's Messy. Podcasting Doesn't Have to Be.
firstLook.description: The All-in-One Podcasting Solution for Businesses, Brands, & Everyone Ready to Share Their Voice

mainFeatures.title: Start your podcast today
mainFeatures.description: Recording, editing, and publishing is free on Messy with unlimited episodes. There is no expensive microphone, studio time, or approval process required.

mainFeatures.title: Record where you want
mainFeatures.description: Messy’s Recording Studio will capture your audio perfectly. Our software uses your desktop computer’s default microphone, so no need to buy an expensive microphone ...unless you want to. Or prefer to use another recording platform? Just upload the audio to Messy once you are done.

mainFeatures.title: Editing made easy
mainFeatures.description: Easily edit your recordings by cutting out awkward pauses, fading in and out of segments, and adding music with our drag-and-drop editor.

cards.title: Add music
cards.description: Our Music Library is full of exclusive, attribution-free tracks you can use as intro, outro, or segment transition.

cards.title: Host your RSS feed
cards.description: Unlimited hosting, no matter how often you publish (daily shows are in now) or how long each episode is.

cards.title: Publish your show
cards.description: Make sure your podcast is everywhere your listeners are: Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, Spotify, and more.

cards.title: Get analytics
cards.description: Always know the total number of listens your podcast gets across every platform, divided by episode and date.

cards.title: Make money
cards.description: Listener Support lets your fans support your work so you only need to think about creating great content.

cards.title: Promote your show
cards.description: Reach more listeners when your show is featured as a Top & Trending or Can’t Miss Show on Messy.

cards.title: Private podcasting
cards.description: Make your podcast password-protected so only certain listeners can listen, like your employers or friends.

cards.title: Embed your podcast
cards.description: Already have a website? We make it easy for your site visitors to listen to your podcast without ever leaving it.

testimonials.author: Amina
testimonials.testimonial: Messy is a cost-effective way to make a top-quality podcast. I’ve never made a podcast before, yet using Messy has made it incredibly easy. The Messy team responds quickly if you have questions and you can genuinely tell that they care about making sure your project is successful.

testimonials.author: Carrie and Taryn
testimonials.testimonial: We initially chose Messy because of it's super user-friendly interface. We were not intimidated at all by the editing or recording tools. Messy allows us to focus more on our content, and to just get after our goals.

testimonials.author: Dawnette
testimonials.testimonial: As the host of my show, I get to pick the voices that are heard and we hold nothing back. I love to hear the feedback on how impactful my show has become on a global scale. Using Messy, it’s been easy to maneuver and integrate into other platforms.
